text: Furnace Island, or simply Furnace (officially known by its Irish name Fornais),Placenames (Ceantair Ghaeltachta) Order 2004 is one of the inhabited South Connemara Islands of County Galway, in Ireland. It is connected to the mainland by a bridge to the island Lettermullan. == See also == * Ceantar na nOileán == References and further reading == ==References== Category:Islands of County Galway
title: Furnace Island
